text: Herbert Harvey Pollack (March 9, 1922 - June 23, 2015) was an American NBA official. He was director of statistical information for the Philadelphia 76ers. At the time of his death, Pollack was the only individual still working for the NBA since its inaugural 1946-47 season.John Bunn Award Recipient ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Harvey Pollack
